text: [[b]]Lady Mi[[/b]]\\nSteadfast Loyalist\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Lady Mi will do anything to protect her family - even if it means sacrificing herself.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Pei Yuanshao[[/b]]\\nVirtuous Outrider\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_ytr_general_type_veteran}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]Whether in charge of brigands or soldiers, one must lead by example, always riding at the head of the host.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yuan Shang[[/b]]\\nFavoured Son\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_earth}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]To be chosen is an accolate in its own right. To take the reigns of one's own lineage? Perhaps that is a blessing.[[/col]][[/i]]

[[b]]Yu Jin[[/b]]\\nEnforcer of the Law\\n\\nGerneral Type: {{tr:3k_general_type_metal}}\\n\\n[[col:flavour]][[i]]As an imprecious, by-the-book disciplinarian, Yu Jin rules his subordinates with fear and drilled-in obedience.[[/col]][[/i]]
